mapper.select: select count(1) from tasks where parent_task_id = #{parentTaskId}
select id, user_id, parent_task_id, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at, decomposed_at from tasks where parent_task_id = #{parentTaskId} order by id asc
mapper.update: update tasks set decomposed_at = now(), updated_at = now() where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tasks (user_id, parent_task_id, title, description, due_date, priority, status, created_at, updated_at, decomposed_at) values (#{userId}, #{parentTaskId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{dueDate}, #{priority}, #{status}, now(), now(), #{decomposedAt})
mapper.update: update tasks set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, priority = #{priority}, due_date = #{dueDate}, parent_task_id = #{parentTaskId}, decomposed_at = #{decomposedAt}, updated_at = now() where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from tasks where id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
